name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Innovation**

Footprints Festival 2026 brings together an eclectic lineup of 11 artists from 10 countries, showcasing a rich tapestry of global sounds. With genres ranging from Electronic and Psychedelic to Malian Desert Blues and Traditional Iranian music, the festival offers a unique convergence of musical traditions and contemporary innovation. The festival's average rating of 7.73 reflects its high-quality curation, with the majority of acts receiving praise in the 8-9 range.

The festivalâ€™s commitment to diversity is evident in its representation of artists from different cultural and musical backgrounds. Seven of the 11 artists identify as people of color, and the lineup includes a balanced mix of male, female, and mixed-gender acts. Germany leads the roster with four artists, while countries like Nigeria, Turkey, Brazil, and Iran add to the cross-cultural richness of the event.

Footprints Festival 2026 stands out as a platform for both genre-defying experimentation and the celebration of heritage. From the hypnotic rhythms of Afrobeat and Anatolian Rock to the introspective tones of minimalist electropop and Armenian Folk, the festival invites audiences to explore the intersections of tradition and modernity. With all artists featured on Spotify, attendees can dive into the music beforehand, ensuring an immersive and unforgettable festival experience.
